question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. red airplane
B. orange truck
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The orange truck is in the foreground on the runway, while the red airplane is in the background performing a maneuver, making the truck clearly closer to the camera.
